Terms.title: How We Work Together
Terms.subtitle: Clear principles for a partnership built on trust.

0.title: The Blueprint (With a Human Touch)
0.content:
We rely on the Technical Specification to keep the project on track and within budget. However, I am a partner, not a robot.

**The Rule**: Major changes that alter the logic or design (e.g., "Let's add a new page") are new tasks.
**The Exception**: Small, reasonable tweaks that improve the user experience (e.g., "Can we make this text bold?" or "Let's swap these two buttons") are on the house. I want the product to be perfect just as much as you do.

1.title: My "High Confidence" Deadline Guarantee
1.content:
I take timelines seriously.

**The Promise**: If I miss the final deadline due to my own fault, I will apply a 15% discount for every week of delay.
**The Condition (Two-Way Street)**: This guarantee applies when I have everything I need. If the delay is caused by waiting for your feedback, assets, or credentials, the deadline naturally shifts. I can‚Äôt build without bricks!

2.title: Revisions vs. Polish
2.content:
Perfection is a process. For every delivered milestone, we have 2 Rounds of Revisions.

**What this covers**: Adjusting logic, design polish, and making sure everything works as envisioned.
**The Goal**: To reach a "Definition of Done" efficiently without getting stuck in endless feedback loops.

3.title: 30-Day "No-Headache" Warranty
3.content:
I take full responsibility for my work.

**My Fault = Free Fix**: If a bug is caused by my code, my oversight, or my logic error - I fix it immediately and for free. No questions asked. This applies for 30 days after delivery.
**External Factors**: Issues caused by 3rd-party updates (e.g., hosting changes, API updates) or code modifications by others are separate support tasks.

4.title: Stress-Free Deployment (You Own Everything)
4.content:
Zero Vendor Lock-in. I handle the entire technical setup - you don't need to touch the terminal.

**The Process**: I will guide you to create an account on the hosting platform (e.g., Vercel, VPS) so that you are the legal owner of the account and billing.
**My Job**: Once you give me access, I handle the rest: server configuration, domain connection, SSL, and deployment.
**Result**: You get a turnkey, working product. I hand over the code and keys, and you retain 100% ownership.

5.title: Communication
5.content:
I am based in Seoul (GMT+9) and work asynchronously to maximize focus.

**Reliability**: I reply to all messages within 24 hours.
**Transparency**: You won't have to chase me. I provide proactive updates so you always know the status of your project.

6.title: Input Materials (Design & Content)
6.content:
To build a high-quality product, I need high-quality inputs.

**Design**: I am a Software Architect, not a Graphic Designer. You are responsible for providing the design mockup (Figma, Photoshop, or Sketch). My job is to turn that design into pixel-perfect, functioning code.
**Note**: If you don't have a design, I can build a clean, structural UI using modern best practices (Shadcn/UI), but it won't be a custom artistic design.
**Content**: You provide the text, logos, and images. If they aren't ready, I will use placeholders (Lorem Ipsum) to keep development moving. This ensures we don't delay the technical launch waiting for a copywriter.

7.title: The Fine Print (Important Details)
7.content:
**Project Pausing (The "Ghost" Clause)**: I schedule my time specifically for you. If you become unresponsive for more than 10 business days, the project is considered "Paused." To restart a paused project, we will need to schedule a new timeline based on my current availability.

**Portfolio Rights**: I am proud of what we build together. I reserve the right to display the finished project in my portfolio (excluding any sensitive data). If you require strict confidentiality (NDA), please let me know before we start.

**Third-Party Costs**: My fee covers development. It does not cover ongoing costs for Hosting (e.g., Vercel, AWS), Domain names, Paid APIs or Plugins. I will always advise you on these costs upfront.
